backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining profile, post, comment, and follow types with sorting helpers, storage maps, authorization checks, and profile retrieval/update logic.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature-evidence report mapping implemented product features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and role in the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining a coral/peach OKLCH theme with light and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router with authentication gating, profile setup dialog, and routes for feed, posts, creation, and profiles.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Login screen with branding, Internet Identity sign-in button, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to enter display name and bio, saving profiles with a placeholder avatar.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Form for writing and submitting comments with validation, character count, and loading state.
Renders a list of comments with avatars, timestamps, and loading/empty states.
Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, and user menu handling logout.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a post with image, author info, like toggling, and navigation to the post page.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Dialog for editing profile info including display name, bio, and profile image upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth state and provides login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, loading stored identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, posts, comments, feed, and profile updates using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Provides a form to upload an image, preview it, enter a caption, and submit a new post with upload progress.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Loads and displays an infinite-scrolling feed of posts with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single post with image, caption, likes, comments, and allows liking and navigation back.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user profile with avatar, bio, follower stats, and optional edit dialog for the owner.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state for building an Instagram‑like app, including required images and a list of implemented features. Contains metadata, versioning, and architectural notes placeholders.
